channel.title: [Prank]Soda can Prank :O
channel.description:
[b]SODA CAN PRANK[/b]
Items needed: +more than 100 cans of Soda,beer.. +A Door (which is Closed!). + Stupid Friend/Brother/Sister... +Tape.
~Start~ When your Friend (Or brother/Sister..) Is home and in hes/her room,Start making a Soda Can Towers rigth behind the Door.You need Many cans that Trick will be funny :D... When you have VERY LARGE towers (about 3-5),Use Tape. You have to make a "Tape Wall" that cans cannot fall from there to your side. When you have Full "Tape Wall", Just go away..and WAIT UNTIL HE/SHE comes out from the Room. When He/She opens the Door...:D
Credit:~Unca Donald~

unless the hinge goes the other way…

item.title: [Prank]Soda can Prank :O
item.dc:creator: @badness badness
item.description:
@badness wrote:

SODA CAN PRANK

Items needed:
+more than 100 cans of Soda,beer…
+A Door (which is Closed!).

  • Stupid Friend/Brother/Sister…
    +Tape.

~Start~
When your Friend (Or brother/Sister…) Is home and in hes/her room,Start making a Soda Can Towers rigth behind the Door.You need Many cans that Trick will be funny :D…
When you have VERY LARGE towers (about 3-5),Use Tape.
You have to make a “Tape Wall” that cans cannot fall from there to your side.
When you have Full “Tape Wall”, Just go away…and WAIT UNTIL HE/SHE comes out from the Room.
When He/She opens the Door…

Credit:~Unca Donald~

Read full topic
